options.name: section-name
options.description: Section Name

options.name: command-name
options.description: Command Name

say.name: say
say.description: Make the bot send a message in the specified channel.

options.name: channel
options.description: The channel to send the message in.

options.name: message
options.description: The message to send.

testsuite.name: testsuite
testsuite.description: Runs a test suite for a command

options.name: command-name
options.description: The name of the command to test.

options.name: avatar-url
options.description: Avatar URL

options.name: locale
options.description: Locale

options.name: bot-nickname
options.description: Bot Nickname

botsrc.name: botsrc
botsrc.description: Links to the GitHub repository of rookbot

castlename.name: castlename
castlename.description: Immediately triggers a nickname change for castle, to a random castle-esque name

doigame.name: doigame
doigame.description: Sends a message with download info for *The Legend of Zelda - Dungeons of Infinity*.

justin.name: justin
justin.description: Displays an embed showcasing the developer's video games from their portfolio.

moth.name: moth
moth.description: Hear it from the legend himself

coinflip.name: coinflip
coinflip.description: Flips a coin and return either Heads or Tails

diceroll.name: diceroll
diceroll.description: Rolls a specified number of dice with a specified number of sides

options.name: count
options.description: Number of dice to roll (1-10)

options.name: sides
options.description: Number of sides on each die (2-9999)

options.name: expression
options.description: The math expression to evaluate

color.name: color
color.description: Displays information about a hex color code

options.name: hex
options.description: A hex color code (e.g., #FF5733 or FF5733)

boosters.name: boosters
boosters.description: Displays the number of boosters and the server boost level

membercount.name: membercount
membercount.description: Displays the total number of registered members on the server.

mention.name: mention
mention.description: Give code to post a mention in chat

options.name: target-id
options.description: ID of target

options.name: target-type
options.description: Mention Type

embed.name: embed
embed.description: Sends an embed with predefined content

pfp.name: pfp
pfp.description: Displays the profile picture of the mentioned user

options.name: target-id
options.description: The user whose profile picture you want to see

ban.name: ban
ban.description: Bans a user from the server

options.name: target-id
options.description: The ID of the user you want to ban.

options.name: reason
options.description: The reason for banning the user.

kick.name: kick
kick.description: Kicks a user from the server.

options.name: target-id
options.description: The ID of the user you want to kick.

options.name: reason
options.description: The reason for kicking the user.

lock.name: lock
lock.description: Locks a channel, preventing anyone from sending messages.

options.name: channel
options.description: The channel to lock.

lockdown.name: lockdown
lockdown.description: Locks or unlocks all channels for the @everyone role.

options.name: action
options.description: Specify whether to lock or unlock all channels.

options.name: confirm
options.description: Boolean to confirm the action and avoid accidental execution.

mute.name: mute
mute.description: Mutes a user in the server

options.name: target-id
options.description: The ID of the user you want to ban.

options.name: member-role-id
options.description: The ID of the Member Role you want to remove

options.name: muted-role-id
options.description: The ID of the Muted Role you want to add

options.name: reason
options.description: The reason for banning the user.

role_add.name: role_add
role_add.description: Adds a role to a member

options.name: target-id
options.description: The ID of the user you want to add the role to.

options.name: role
options.description: Role to add

options.name: reason
options.description: Reason for adding role

role_remove.name: role_remove
role_remove.description: Removes a role from a member

options.name: target-id
options.description: The ID of the user you want to remove the role from.

options.name: role
options.description: Role to remove

options.name: reason
options.description: Reason for adding role

options.name: search-type
options.description: Search Type

options.name: target-id
options.description: User ID to search for

timeout.name: timeout
timeout.description: Times out a user for a specified duration.

options.name: target-id
options.description: The ID of the user you want to timeout.

options.name: duration-seconds
options.description: The duration of the timeout (in seconds).

options.name: reason
options.description: The reason for the timeout.

unban.name: unban
unban.description: Unbans a user from the server.

options.name: target-id
options.description: The ID of the user you want to unban.

options.name: reason
options.description: The reason for unbanning the user.

unlock.name: unlock
unlock.description: Unlocks a channel, allowing users to send messages again.

options.name: channel
options.description: The channel to unlock.

unmute.name: unmute
unmute.description: Unmutes a user in the server

options.name: target-id
options.description: The ID of the user you want to ban.

options.name: member-role-id
options.description: The ID of the Member Role you want to add

options.name: muted-role-id
options.description: The ID of the Muted Role you want to remove

options.name: reason
options.description: The reason for banning the user.

warn.name: warn
warn.description: Warns a user in the server.

options.name: target-id
options.description: The ID of the user you want to warn.

options.name: reason
options.description: The reason for warning the user.

options.name: game-id
options.description: Game ID to call from

options.name: slug-id
options.description: Slug ID to call

smz3.name: smz3
smz3.description: Starts an SMZ3 game with all necessary details

options.name: ping-multiplayer-role
options.description: Whether or not to ping the Multiplayer Ping role

options.name: seed-url
options.description: The URL of the seed to play

options.name: prep-time
options.description: The number of minutes to prepare before the game starts.
